dialogues.sentenceTemplate: Ugh, I just need something crispy and salty right now... can you make me some {dish}?
I was going to eat healthy today, but then I remembered {dish} exists. Worth it.
My friends are coming over for movie night. No {dish}, no friendship. You know the rule.
Life’s tough, but a bowl of {dish} makes it better. Can you make it extra creamy?
Lunch break in 10 minutes! I need a {dish} before my coworker steals the last one again.
I overslept again… can you make me an {dish} so it at least looks like I have my life together?
Date night disaster! I promised homemade {dish}, can you save my love life?
Trying to be healthy for once... Can you make a {dish} that doesn’t taste like sadness?
I caught a cold and need comfort food ASAP. Only {dish} can fix my soul.
